name: Street Basketball JAM: Real Basketball kings of dribbling and dunk smashes 2016 by BULKY SPORTS [Premium]
name_original: Street Basketball JAM: Real Basketball kings of dribbling and dunk smashes 2016 by BULKY SPORTS [Premium]
description:
************************
All Items Unlocked
************************
Missing Energy Basketball on Appstore?
Here comes the STREET EDITION of real basketball game. Its newest, fast paced and full of action basketball simulation. Enjoy the game in beautiful street environment.

Do you hesitate in challenging best teams in TOURNAMENT? Train your team by practicing in TRAINING MODE and get ready for big matches. We brought different game modes that you can play as per your comfort
-Training mode
-Tournament mode
-Knockout mode
Friendly mode

You may be missing playing it with your friends? We have integrated global leaderboard to showcase your victory all around the world. 

Win matches and get rewarded with virtual currency. Using virtual currency buy items in your game and unlock game modes.

You might have suggestions or feedback about this game. Please write to us ask.bulkysports@gmail.com.

Enjoy...!!!!!
